name: Mushrooms (Shiitake)
benefits: Mushrooms, especially shiitake, are low in calorie density and high in water content. Featured in hot and sour soup which is particularly satiating. Part of the optimal weight-loss diet due to low glycemic load and high water content.
amount: Part of Daily Dozen vegetables - aim for multiple servings daily

quotes: This soup is easily customizable to please your palate... And if you prefer as heartier soup, add some cooked whole grains or 100% buckwheat noodles just before serving.
